item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: I did some brief research just now on CalTrans... gotta be a civil engineer. hmm, considering it after I finish the recording engineering stuff. We'll see. lol
item.content:encoded: I did some brief research just now on CalTrans… gotta be a civil engineer. hmm, considering it after I finish the recording engineering stuff. We’ll see. lol

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description: I read that Japan is really good about road conditions... potholes are corrected quickly rather than ignored like here in the States, lol. If you go forward with Cal Trans, don't forget about the Bay Area!
item.content:encoded: I read that Japan is really good about road conditions… potholes are corrected quickly rather than ignored like here in the States, lol. If you go forward with Cal Trans, don’t forget about the Bay Area!

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: I love those roads. Actually had a random talk to my GF about me being interested to work with Cal Trans. It'd be cool to make a difference for fellow drivers. Especially ones from LA. lol
item.content:encoded: I love those roads. Actually had a random talk to my GF about me being interested to work with Cal Trans. It’d be cool to make a difference for fellow drivers. Especially ones from LA. lol
